mapper.select: select GUESTHOUSE_ID guesthouseId, USER_ID userId, NAME, ROOM_COUNT roomCount, HWEBSITE, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, PHONE, LAT, LNG, CHECKIN_START checkinStart, CHECKIN_END checkinEnd, CHECKOUT_START checkoutStart, CHECKOUT_END checkoutEnd, INTERNET, PARK, CHILD, PET, ROOM_PAY housePay, INTRODUCE, PICTURE from guesthouse where USER_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into guesthouse (GUESTHOUSE_ID, USER_ID, NAME, ROOM_COUNT, HWEBSITE, PHONE, ROOM_PAY, PICTURE) values (SEQ_GUESTHOUSE_GUESTHOUSE_ID.nextval, #{userid}, #{houseName}, #{houseTotal}, #{houseSite}, #{housePhone}, #{housePay}, #{picture})
mapper.select: select * from ( select ROOM_ID roomId , GUESTHOUSE_ID guesthouseId, ROOM_TYPE roomType, ROOM_NAME roomName, ROOM_NUM roomNum, BED_TYPE bedType, BED_NUM bedNum, BED_CAPACITY bedCapacity, ROOM_PRICE roomPay from room where GUESTHOUSE_ID = #{id}) where rownum=1
mapper.insert: insert into room (ROOM_ID, GUESTHOUSE_ID, ROOM_TYPE, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_NUM, BED_TYPE, BED_NUM, BED_CAPACITY, ROOM_PRICE) values (SEQ_ROOM_ROOM_ID.nextval,#{room.guesthouseId}, #{room.roomType}, #{room.roomName},#{room.roomNum}, #{room.bedType}, #{room.bedNum}, #{room.bedCapacity}, #{room.roomPay})
insert into room_picture (PICTURE_ID, ROOM_ID, PICTURE, GUESTHOUSE_ID ) values (SEQ_ROOM_PICTURE_PICTURE_ID.nextval, #{room.roomId}, #{name.picture}, #{room.guesthouseId})
